casebody.data:
Horton et al., Appellants, v. Addy et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Horton v. Addy (1994), 69 Ohio St.3d 181.]

(No. 93-592 Submitted March 30, 1994 Decided May 4, 1994.) E.S. Gallon & Associates and David M. Deutsch, for appellants. Freund, Freeze & Arnold, Patrick J. Janis and Fredric L. Young, for appellees. Wolske & Blue and Gerald S. Leeseberg, urging reversal for amicus curiae, Ohio Academy of Trial Lawyers. Frost & Jacobs, Grant S. Cowan and Gregory A. Key ser, urging affirmance for amicus curiae, Ohio Association of Civil Trial Attorneys. Lang & Donoff, Marilyn R. Donojf and Paul W. Mills, urging affirmance for amici curiae, Auto Club Insurance Company and Nevin Gross.

The judgment of the court of appeals is vacated and the appeal is dismissed for want of a final appealable order. The causis is remanded to the trial court for further proceedings.

Moyer, C.J., AW. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick and F.E. Sweeney, JJ., concur. Pfeifer, J., dissents.
